intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! The world after Operation Midnight Hammer! The frozen wasteland has entered a cooling period due to nuclear facility collapse!
description:
After the final strike of Operation Midnight Hammer rang out, the heat of battle was swallowed by extreme cold in the aftermath of nuclear facility destruction, and strategic strongholds entered a new phase under the dominion of frozen snowfields. Powerful tank units heighten the excitement of combat! On the battlefield, allied tanks cooperate with you to break through enemy positions, defend, and support operations with powerful firepower. Dynamic combat with infantry and tanks united creates an unprecedented battlefield experience. Set in the frozen wastelands after Operation Midnight Hammer, choose a role that suits you from four distinctive special forces characters and enjoy strategic gameplay cooperating with teammates and tanks. Photorealistic graphics and 3D sound recreate the intense battlefield with overwhelming realism.

・Tank units join the fight in vast open fields. Allied tanks support operations, bringing overwhelming power and strategic depth to the battlefield.
・Ultra-high-definition graphics and 3D sound realistically reproduce every snowflake on the battlefield, gunfire, explosions, and even the thunderous roar of tanks.
・Utilize the characteristics of four elite characters, special weapons, and tank firepower to tackle missions while cooperating with teammates.
・Intuitive aiming and controls allow everyone from beginners to veterans to experience gripping combat.
・Overwhelming realism! Enjoy vivid and dynamic gameplay with 3D sound and 3D physics engine.
・Enjoy varied tactics utilizing the characteristics of four character types: Assault, Engineer, Support, and Reconnaissance.
・Various game modes are available. Experience 'Deathmatch Mode', 'Domination Mode', and 'Search & Destroy Mode'.
・Dive into the battlefield as a member of the world's elite special forces and aim to complete 'Combat Strike' missions.

The snow-swept wastelands come alive with overwhelming photorealistic graphics. Experience unprecedented immersion created by diverse 3D effects and cutting-edge graphics technology. Do experience the ultimate realistic battlefield single-player FPS 'Combat Strike' where you fight alongside teammates!

Synopsis
Endless white wastelands stretch as far as the eye can see. After the final strike of Operation Midnight Hammer bombers rang out, the heat of battle was swallowed by extreme cold in the aftermath of nuclear facility destruction. Strategic strongholds fell under the dominion of frozen snowfields, and the world entered a rapid cooling period, facing a new phase. Deep within the frozen earth, rare minerals that could spark the next generation's energy revolution still slumber, wrapped in ice crystals. These crystalline bodies, glowing as if imbued with life, possess the essential power needed to rebuild the collapsed world.

The secret research team of the massive corporation 'Kronos Industries' developed new technology capable of mining these minerals even in extreme environments. While appearing to be an IT company on the surface, they harbor ambitions to monopolize unknown energy in the devastated world and establish a new world order. Kronos reorganized the 'Shadow Legion', composed of former special forces personnel, strengthening cold-weather equipment and advancing the development of frozen mines.

Their movements were detected by international intelligence agencies, and nations dispatched elite special forces to the snow-swept wastelands. They were tasked with preventing Kronos's energy extraction and making secured resources a shared asset of the recovering international community. However, the Shadow Legion also stands ready to fight back with the latest cold-weather equipment and organizational strength. In this extreme battlefield, you will take on the 'Combat Strike' mission as a member of the special forces.
